Connection.title: Connection
Connection.description: Represents a relationship between a byte and a bit in a specific tree and year.

byte.description: The name of the byte (the parent/mentor).

bit.description: The name of the bit (the child/mentee).

treeName.description: The name of the tree this connection belongs to.

year.description: The year the connection (pickup) was made.

/connections/{connectionId}.description: Stores all the bit/byte connections for all trees.
